message: Hi Bob, let's start off fair. I take $60 and you get $40. It's best to settle this quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
Hi Alice, your offer seems a bit unbalanced. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  We still avoid some inflation this round.
No deal, Bob. How about we switch it up - I'll take $55, and you get $45.  We're running out of time to get ahead of inflation!
Alice, let's stop wasting time and split this evenly. 50/50. It's the fairest option, and we're losing money with each round!
